624530.name: AereA - Soundtrack
624530.description:
欣赏美妙《AereA》游戏原声音乐。

Deon van Heerden 与 Gustavo Barcamor 作曲。
Jo Ellis 演奏。
音乐文件可在游戏安装目录中找到。

  • The Journey Begins
  • Aezir Concert Hall
  • Aboard the Ship of Wind
  • A Dark Place
  • Webs and Weavers
  • Octavian Pipes
  • Scorching Desert
  • Trouble Beneath
  • Demetrio's Interlude
  • Temple of Water
  • Ruler of the Skies
  • Welcome to the Jungle
  • Concord of the Snake
  • Liethel Concert Hall
  • Nightmare Circus
  • Burning Cave
  • Double Trouble
  • Spiral Concert Hall
  • Eleanor's Theme
  • Cold as Ice
  • Drums in the Deep
  • The Grande Finale
  • Lurking Evil (Bonus Track)
  • The Curtain Falls (Bonus Track)
